languages.text: "Их корабли, которые сложно спутать с какими либо другими, появляются внезапно и незаметно — их технологии маскировки намного превосходят стандартные имперские системы авгуров. Их рейды имеют целью не захватить мир или судно — нет, их интересуют только новые жертвы. Набив трюмы живыми людьми, они скрываются со своей добычей в {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Паутине{/g} — ином измерении, где находится их главный оплот. Комморра. Темный город друкари, откуда нет надежды спастись".

"Their ships, which are difficult to mistake for any other, arrive suddenly and undetected — their stealth technologies greatly surpass the capabilities of standard Imperium augur arrays. The objective of their raids is never to capture a world or a ship — no, they are only interested in fresh victims. After filling their holds with living captives, they disappear into the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} — a different dimension, which conceals their greatest stronghold. Commorragh. The Dark City of the Drukhari, from which none can hope to escape."
languages.original_text: "Их корабли, которые сложно спутать с какими либо другими, появляются внезапно и незаметно — их технологии маскировки намного превосходят стандартные имперские системы авгуров. Их рейды имеют целью не захватить мир или судно — нет, их интересуют только новые жертвы. Набив трюмы живыми людьми, они скрываются со своей добычей в {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Паутине{/g} — ином измерении, где находится их главный оплот. Комморра. Темный город друкари, откуда нет надежды спастись".

languages.text: “他们的飞船一眼就能认得出来。他们的隐形技术远远超出了帝国俄歇矩阵的扫描能力，可以在不被任何人发现的情况下突然出现在目的地。他们袭击的目的并不是为了夺取舰船或占领世界，仅仅是对受害者本身感兴趣。当他们把飞船里塞满了俘虏之后，就会消失在{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}网道{/g}之中。他们的网道处于另一个维度之中，而他们规模最为庞大的据点‘科摩罗’也藏在那里。那个地方是他们的黑暗之城，没人能从那里活着逃出来。”
languages.original_text: "Their ships, which are difficult to mistake for any other, arrive suddenly and undetected — their stealth technologies greatly surpass the capabilities of standard Imperium augur arrays. The objective of their raids is never to capture a world or a ship — no, they are only interested in fresh victims. After filling their holds with living captives, they disappear into the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} — a different dimension, which conceals their greatest stronghold. Commorragh. The Dark City of the Drukhari, from which none can hope to escape."

traits.locale_text: “他们的飞船一眼就能认得出来。他们的隐形技术远远超出了帝国俄歇矩阵的扫描能力，可以在不被任何人发现的情况下突然出现在目的地。他们袭击的目的并不是为了夺取舰船或占领世界，仅仅是对受害者本身感兴趣。当他们把飞船里塞满了俘虏之后，就会消失在{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}网道{/g}之中。他们的网道处于另一个维度之中，而他们规模最为庞大的据点‘科摩罗’也藏在那里。那个地方是他们的黑暗之城，没人能从那里活着逃出来。”

languages.text: « Leurs vaisseaux, à nuls autres pareils, bénéficient d'une technologie de furtivité dépassent de loin les capacités des scrutateurs de l'Imperium, ce qui leur permet d'arriver sans être détectés. Leurs raids n'ont jamais pour objectif de capturer un monde ou un vaisseau. Non. Tout ce qui les intéresse, c'est de faire le plein de chair fraîche. Et une fois que leurs cales sont pleines, ils disparaissent dans la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Toile{/g}, une autre dimension qui cache leur plus grand bastion : Commorragh. La Cité Crépusculaire des Drukharis. La ville dont personne n'a jamais réussi à s'échapper. »
languages.original_text: "Their ships, which are difficult to mistake for any other, arrive suddenly and undetected — their stealth technologies greatly surpass the capabilities of standard Imperium augur arrays. The objective of their raids is never to capture a world or a ship — no, they are only interested in fresh victims. After filling their holds with living captives, they disappear into the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} — a different dimension, which conceals their greatest stronghold. Commorragh. The Dark City of the Drukhari, from which none can hope to escape."

traits.locale_text: « Leurs vaisseaux, à nuls autres pareils, bénéficient d'une technologie de furtivité dépassent de loin les capacités des augures standards de l'Imperium, ce qui leur permet d'arriver sans être détectés. Leurs raids n'ont jamais pour objectif de capturer un monde ou un vaisseau. Non. Tout ce qui les intéresse, c'est de faire le plein de chair fraîche. Et une fois que leurs cales sont pleines, ils disparaissent dans la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Toile{/g}, une autre dimension qui cache leur plus grand bastion : Commorragh. La Cité Crépusculaire des Drukharis. La ville dont personne n'a jamais réussi à s'échapper. »

languages.text: «Sus naves, que resultan inconfundibles, llegan de forma repentina e indetectada, ya que sus tecnologías de sigilo superan con creces las capacidades de los augures estándar del Imperium. El objetivo de sus incursiones nunca es apoderarse de un mundo o una nave: solo les interesa atrapar nuevas víctimas. Tras llenar sus bodegas de cautivos, desaparecen en la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Telaraña{/g}, otra dimensión en la que se oculta su mayor bastión. Commorragh, la Ciudad Siniestra de los Drukhari, de la que no hay escapatoria posible».
languages.original_text: "Their ships, which are difficult to mistake for any other, arrive suddenly and undetected — their stealth technologies greatly surpass the capabilities of standard Imperium augur arrays. The objective of their raids is never to capture a world or a ship — no, they are only interested in fresh victims. After filling their holds with living captives, they disappear into the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} — a different dimension, which conceals their greatest stronghold. Commorragh. The Dark City of the Drukhari, from which none can hope to escape."

traits.locale_text: «Sus naves, que resultan inconfundibles, llegan de forma repentina e indetectada, ya que sus tecnologías de sigilo superan con creces las capacidades de los augures estándar del Imperium. El objetivo de sus incursiones nunca es apoderarse de un mundo o una nave: solo les interesa atrapar nuevas víctimas. Tras llenar sus bodegas de cautivos, desaparecen en la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Telaraña{/g}, otra dimensión en la que se oculta su mayor bastión. Commorragh, la Ciudad Siniestra de los Drukhari, de la que no hay escapatoria posible».

languages.text: 「彼らの船は他の船と見間違えるのが難しいものですが、突如として、検知されることなく現れます。奴らのステルス技術は、行順的な帝国のスキャンアレイの性能をはるかに凌駕しているのです。奴らの襲撃の目的は、決して惑星や船を制圧することではありません。奴らは生きた生贄にしか関心を持ちませんからね。捕虜で船倉を満たした後、奴らは{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}網辻{/g}―異次元へと姿を消す。そこには、強大な要塞、コモラフがあります。デュカーリの仄暗き都です。そこからは誰も逃れることはできません」
languages.original_text: "Their ships, which are difficult to mistake for any other, arrive suddenly and undetected — their stealth technologies greatly surpass the capabilities of standard Imperium augur arrays. The objective of their raids is never to capture a world or a ship — no, they are only interested in fresh victims. After filling their holds with living captives, they disappear into the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} — a different dimension, which conceals their greatest stronghold. Commorragh. The Dark City of the Drukhari, from which none can hope to escape."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らの船は他の船と見間違えるのが難しいものですが、突如として、検知されることなく現れます。奴らのステルス技術は、行順的な帝国のスキャンアレイの性能をはるかに凌駕しているのです。奴らの襲撃の目的は、決して惑星や船を制圧することではありません。奴らは生きた生贄にしか関心を持ちませんからね。捕虜で船倉を満たした後、奴らは{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}網辻{/g}―異次元へと姿を消す。そこには、強大な要塞、コモラフがあります。デュカーリの仄暗き都です。そこからは誰も逃れることはできません」

languages.text: "Ihre unverkennbaren Schiffe tauchen plötzlich und unbemerkt auf, denn gegen ihre Tarntechnologien sind gewöhnliche Auguren-Arrays des Imperiums machtlos. Ziel ihrer Überfälle ist es nie, eine Welt oder ein Schiff zu erobern. Nein, sie interessieren sich nur für frische Opfer. Nachdem sie ihre Lagerräume mit lebenden Gefangenen gefüllt haben, verschwinden sie in das {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Netz der Tausend Tore{/g} — eine andere Dimension, die ihre größte Festung verbirgt. Commorragh. Die Dunkle Stadt der Drukhari, aus der es kein Entkommen gibt."
languages.original_text: "Their ships, which are difficult to mistake for any other, arrive suddenly and undetected — their stealth technologies greatly surpass the capabilities of standard Imperium augur arrays. The objective of their raids is never to capture a world or a ship — no, they are only interested in fresh victims. After filling their holds with living captives, they disappear into the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} — a different dimension, which conceals their greatest stronghold. Commorragh. The Dark City of the Drukhari, from which none can hope to escape."

traits.locale_text: "Ihre unverkennbaren Schiffe tauchen plötzlich und unbemerkt auf, denn gegen ihre Tarntechnologien sind gewöhnliche Auguren-Arrays des Imperiums machtlos. Ziel ihrer Überfälle ist es nie, eine Welt oder ein Schiff zu erobern. Nein, sie interessieren sich nur für frische Opfer. Nachdem sie ihre Lagerräume mit lebenden Gefangenen gefüllt haben, verschwinden sie in das {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Netz der Tausend Tore{/g} — eine andere Dimension, die ihre größte Festung verbirgt. Commorragh. Die Dunkle Stadt der Drukhari, aus der es kein Entkommen gibt."

languages.text: "Başka gemilere hiç benzemeyen gemileri; aniden, tespit edilemeden ortaya çıkar. Gizlenme teknolojileri, standart İmparatorluk alamet dizilimlerinin sahip olduğu teknolojinin çok ötesindedir. Baskınlarının hedefi, asla bir dünyayı veya bir gemiyi ele geçirmek değildir. Yalnızca taze kurbanlarla ilgilenirler. Gemilerini yaşayan tutsaklarla doldurduktan sonra farklı bir boyuta, yani {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Ağyol'a{/g} geçip kaybolurlar. En kudretli kaleleri, kaçmanın imkânsız olduğu Kara Drukhari Şehri Commorragh, bu boyutta gizlenmektedir."
languages.original_text: "Their ships, which are difficult to mistake for any other, arrive suddenly and undetected — their stealth technologies greatly surpass the capabilities of standard Imperium augur arrays. The objective of their raids is never to capture a world or a ship — no, they are only interested in fresh victims. After filling their holds with living captives, they disappear into the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} — a different dimension, which conceals their greatest stronghold. Commorragh. The Dark City of the Drukhari, from which none can hope to escape."

traits.locale_text: "Başka gemilere hiç benzemeyen gemileri aniden ve tespit edilemeden ortaya çıkar. Gizlenme teknolojileri standart İmparatorluk alamet dizilimlerinin sahip olduğu teknolojinin çok ötesindedir. Baskınlarının hedefi asla bir dünyayı veya bir gemiyi ele geçirmek değildir. Hayır, onlar yalnızca taze kurbanlarla ilgilenir. Gemilerini yaşayan tutsaklarla doldurduktan sonra farklı bir boyuta, yani {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Ağyol{/g}'a geçip kaybolurlar. En kudretli kaleleri, kaçmanın imkânsız olduğu Kara Drukhari Şehri Commorragh, bu boyutta gizlenmektedir."
